name: SpeK
tagline: the customer is always right (if he writes what he wants!)
body:
... soon on these screens ...

***
A system for the specification of information in such a way that they can be:
- Easily writable / readable by people without specialized informatic skills
- Can be processed in an automatic way for the generation of informatic artifacts

***
Un sistema per la specifica di informazioni in modo tale che possano essere:
- Leggibili / scrivibili facilmente da persone senza competenze specialistiche informatiche
- Elaborabili in modo automatico per la generazione di artefatti informatici

***
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
